Daytona_Beach.Embry\u2013Riddle Aeronautical Universit:
Embry–Riddle Aeronautical University, Daytona Beach is a residential campus of Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University. The university offers associate, bachelor, master's, and PhD degree programs in arts, sciences, aviation, business, and engineering.


== History ==

Embry-Riddle began in 1925 as the Embry-Riddle Company, an aircraft dealer and airmail provider, founded by Talton Higbee Embry and John Paul Riddle in Cincinnati, Ohio.
